      • CREATOR

    • Constructor Detail

      • CotEvent

        public CotEvent()
        Create a default state event. The default state is missing the required attributes 'uid', 'type', 'time', 'start', and 'stale'; The required attributes must be set before the event is valid (isValid()). The required inner point tag is defaulted to 0, 0 (CotPoint.ZERO_POINT) and no detail tag exists.

      • CotEvent
